thread.title: Video: Eight-year-old becomes youngest patient to receive double-hand transplant
thread.title_full: Video: Eight-year-old becomes youngest patient to receive double-hand transplant - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: Video: Eight-year-old becomes youngest patient to receive double-hand transplant
text:
Youngest Patient Receives Double-Hand Transplant (2:04) Eight-year-old Zion Harvey has become the youngest recipient of a double hand transplant, surgeons said Tuesday. The 11-hour operation took place earlier in July at the Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia. Photo: AP
For more video news: Visit our MarketWatch Video Center .
